generated.css: body{background-image:url(eeeb6d1c0ce28a5fe4647f4c03d4b3ab.jpg);background-repeat:round;background-size:300px}.game-window{background-image:url(10e4345bfe7b75f039b8341dd8d4b28e.jpg);background-size:100%;max-width:1200px;max-height:650px;min-width:1050px;margin:0 auto;box-shadow:15px 35px 60px;border:8px ridge #383838;display:grid;grid-template-columns:repeat(18,1fr);grid-template-rows:repeat(9,1fr)}.game-window #message-board{grid-column:4/span 12;grid-row:1/span 1}.game-window #pot{grid-column:4/span 12;grid-row:2/span 4}.game-window #ulf-runeboard{grid-column:1/span 8;grid-row:6/span 2}.game-window #sigrid-runeboard{grid-column:11/span 8;grid-row:6/span 2}.game-window #ulf-board{grid-column:1/span 9;grid-row:9/span 1}.game-window #sigrid-board{grid-column:10/span 9;grid-row:9/span 1}.game-window #ulf-portrait{grid-column:1/span 5;grid-row:2/span 4}.game-window #sigrid-portrait{grid-column:14/span 6;grid-row:2/span 4}.game-window #ulf-buttonboard{grid-column:1/span 8;grid-row:8/span 1}.game-window #sigrid-buttonboard{grid-column:11/span 8;grid-row:8/span 1}.game-window #message-board{background-color:#464040;background-image:url(9af4f17a1bad5e645b874e6a506e2291.jpg);background-size:330px;border:4px ridge #464646;border-radius:20px}.game-window #message-board p{font-family:Carrois Gothic SC,sans-serif;font-size:20px;margin:5px;text-align:center;color:#978a6d;text-shadow:4px 4px 6px #000}.game-window #sigrid-portrait{text-align:right}.game-window .character-portraits{text-shadow:-30px 30px 30px}.game-window .character-portraits img{max-width:100%;height:100%}.game-window #pot{display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-around;align-content:center;flex-wrap:wrap;background-color:rgba(29,18,5,.8)}.game-window #pot img{width:120px;height:120px;margin:8px 20px}.game-window .runeboard{background-color:rgba(54,30,13,.8);height:130px;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-around}.game-window .runeboard img{max-height:80%;max-width:100%}.game-window .runeboard .rune{margin-top:5px;height:100%;transition:.8s}.game-window #ulf-runeboard{border-top:8px ridge #464646;border-right:8px ridge #464646}.game-window #sigrid-runeboard{border-top:8px ridge #464646;border-left:8px ridge #464646}.game-window .buttonboard{background-image:url(9af4f17a1bad5e645b874e6a506e2291.jpg);text-align:center}.game-window .buttonboard .buttons-ind{margin:8px 0 5px;font-family:Norse,serif;font-size:55px;font-weight:700;width:100%;color:#978a6d;text-shadow:4px 4px #000;border:4px ridge #464646;border-radius:30px}.game-window .buttonboard .buttons-ind p{margin:2px}.game-window #ulf-buttonboard{border-right:8px ridge #464646;display:flex;flex-direction:row-reverse}.game-window #sigrid-buttonboard{border-left:8px ridge #464646;display:flex;flex-direction:row}.game-window .draw-button{background-color:rgba(23,104,23,.2)}.game-window .bet-button{background-color:rgba(35,44,128,.2)}.game-window .decline-button{background-color:rgba(148,14,14,.2)}.game-window .player-board{background-color:rgba(32,22,16,.918);background-image:url(9af4f17a1bad5e645b874e6a506e2291.jpg);background-size:350px}.game-window .player-board .stockpile{margin-top:-5px;background-size:250px;color:#978a6d;text-shadow:4px 4px 6px #000;display:flex;flex-direction:row;justify-content:space-around}.game-window .player-board .stockpile img{height:22px;width:22px}.game-window .player-board .stockpile span{font-family:Carrois Gothic SC,sans-serif;font-size:22px;text-transform:uppercase}.game-window .player-board .stockpile .stockpile-num{font-family:Norse,serif;font-size:70px}.game-window .player-board h3{font-family:Norse,sans-serif;font-size:20px;color:#e6e6e6}.game-window #ulf-board{border-top:8px ridge #383838;border-right:8px ridge #383838}.game-window #sigrid-board{border-top:8px ridge #383838;border-left:8px ridge #383838}@media (max-width:1100px){body{background-color:red}}
